home.sentence: KillTypo is a training tool for typing. You will be able to practice and evaluate your self by writting pieces from Wikipedia or your own texts.
home.easytext: Start practicing right now, it's free and you don't have to register. Our unique 'teleprompter' will ease your reading and will let you concentrate on typing.
home.offlinetext: Do you have a modern browser? That's all you need to enjoy KillTypo offline. You can try it just right now, switch off your connection and refresh the page.
home.realtext: Sorry, typos are not permitted here. We believe on real training, so, you will need to use backspace to fix your typos in order to complete the game.
home.freetext: We will let you practicing typing for free forever, we promise it. If this webpage becomes popular, we will probably add some premium features or ads, but there will be always a free option.
home.opentext: This application is not just Open Source but also Free Software. Feel free to help us improving the website, we will absolutely apreciate it.
home.amusingtext: Challenge your friends or try to beat yourself. You will be able to store your progress, share your marks and win badges. Will you attain the top ten? (Coming soon)

mode.minError: You must paste {minWordLimit} words or more.

footer.abouttext: This project has been developed by Alberto Varela in order to learn about Progressive Web Apps and the VueJS Framework. I'll try to improve it little by little, but you can help also, it is Free Software.
footer.contributetext: Do you want to improve this page or help me writting better code? If you have software development experience or if you are willing to make some translations, consider contributing to KillTypo.

notifications.offlineReady: You are now safe to go offline! You can now access https://www.killtypo.com even without an internet connection.

login.loginModalContent: Use your existing accounts to login or to sign up for free and save your scores easily.
